content.p: Join us for our exclusive events, digitally or in person. Join us for our exclusive events, digitally or in person. We update this page with our upcoming activity, it may occasionally be empty while we put our programmes together but do come back to check! You can find out more about events taking place elsewhere at the university on its main event listing. Join us for an informal alumni gathering in Monterrey on Tuesday 14 January! Join us to hear from career coach and consultant, Ciara Eastell OBE, on how to navigate major changes in your career. We'll be in Lagos for our 'Nottingham Nights' series, join staff from our alumni office and network with fellow local graduates. Catch up with all the Nottingham news and network with local alumni at our informal event, hosted by your alumni team.
